name: frame
description: frame your art, diys and memes..
author: tanay-pingalkar <tpingalkar@gmail.com>

scripts.format: npx prettier --write ./server && npx prettier --write ./client && npx prettier --check ./client && npx prettier --check ./server
scripts.install: cd server && yarn && cd .. && cd client && yarn && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
